item.description:
Come on down and *VOTE* for your favorite person to skunk!!

We have fun, play a great game of cribbage and just enjoy the evening..

Joe, it was great meeting you and hope you come back.

Miss you lots Gerrie and hope all is well with you...

Karen, Laura, Teresa, Dave, Bette, Trina - A*W*E*S*O*M*E to be able to play
cribbage with y'all.....
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards out and skunking someone !
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meet Up and *VOTE * for your favorite person to SKUNK!!
